name: Last Day
description:
Today is the last day. Before leaving, perhaps the other employees deserve a farewell. Health insurance does not cover meetings with other employees. Be aware that some employees are extremely tall, sometimes psychokinetic and possibly transcend the physical plane.

This short adventure requires approximately two hours for completion, and features :

- Twenty unique office themed boss battles

- Simple combat with emphasis on timing and reaction

- Dystopian story told through found letters

- Custom soundtrack with over six different pieces

- Harder difficulty setting for additional replayability

Use the arrow keys to guide them.

Use the C key to interact with things.

Use the X key to run.

If you enjoy this experience be sure to rate it, recommend it to your acquaintances or; leave a comment on what you appreciated along with any suggestions you may have for improvements.  Without this support it is very difficult for games to gain any kind of public attention.
